ck_analytics: Analytics/actions – user actions and resource operations by outlet, action_type, action_date, counts
ck_attendance: Attendance – user check-in/check-out records (start_time, end_time, outletcode, activity, attendance_type, status)
ck_delivery_pjp: Delivery PJP (plan journey plan) – planned delivery visits by beat, outlet, month/year, pjp_date
ck_device_info: Device info – app/device details per user (loginid, device_id, model, app_version, gps_availability, user_hierarchy)
ck_hierarchy_metadata: Hierarchy metadata – hierarchy tree nodes (hierarchy, parent, location_hierarchy)
ck_location: Location – geography hierarchy (area, region, zone, city, state, country, location_hierarchy)
ck_order_details: Order line items – per-SKU quantities and amounts for each order (order_id, skucode, quantity, price, discount_info)
ck_orders: Orders – order headers (outletcode, order_number, dates, totals, status, supplierid, hierarchy)
ck_outlet_activity: Outlet activity – outlet visit/activity records (outletcode, loginid, activity, start_time, end_time, channel, outlet_category)
ck_outlet_details: Outlet details – retail outlets (outletcode, outlet_name, address, beat, channel, location_hierarchy, hierarchy)
ck_outlet_details_hierarchymetadata: Outlet–hierarchy link – links outlets to hierarchy metadata (outlet_id, hierarchy_metadata_id)
ck_outlet_status: Outlet status – outlet engagement (outletcode, first/last ordered/billed/visit/pjp dates, total_order, total_billed, top_store)
ck_productdetails: Product/SKU details – SKU master (sku_code, brand, category, mrp, size, unit_of_measurement)
ck_route_info: Route info – routes, outlets, salesmen (route_code, outlet_code, salesman_code, supplier, route_type)
ck_sales: Sales – invoice/sales headers (invoice_number, outletcode, order_number, amounts, delivery_date, status)
ck_sales_details: Sales line items – per-SKU quantities and amounts per sale (sale_id, skucode, batch_code, quantity, price)
ck_tax: Tax – tax rules by SKU/state (sku_code, state, tax_group, tax_rate, tax_type, start_date, end_date)
ck_user: User – user accounts (loginid, name, hierarchy, location_hierarchy, email, mobile)
ck_user_parent: User–parent mapping – user reporting hierarchy (userloginid, parent)
dms_loadout: DMS loadout header – load-out number, status/type/source, vehicle, dates, total quantities/amounts
dms_loadout_details: DMS loadout details – invoices per loadout (load_number, invoice_number, outlet_code, route_code, totals)
dms_loadout_items: DMS loadout items – per-SKU quantities/amounts per loadout detail (batch_code, sku_code, case_qty, piece_qty, item_type)
